
---
title: '蹲点速度抢：京东 12 期免息券限量发放'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 分类资讯

author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Sun, 12 Dec 2021 03:54:01 GMT

---

<div>   
<p data-vmark="3b63">京东现已放出 12 期免息券活动页面，每日 0 点、12 点、16 点、20 点、22 点限量发放：<a href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAOQJK1olXDYDZBoCUBVIMzZNXhpXVhgcFR0DFxBCHD1WR0VJDVtfSg4PTRNQV3ELXiZdPllcFDc8YRxDfAYBfQN0LlxxAQcaaEgJWzBdTxIKBENeCVBtQw1tADV-Qyd3AWQHVQc1AC8fVA5Ja1cZbQIBUV9fAEofCl8LGVwXWwIHV1ltayx5WStwbgFRNm4yVFttQyUWM28LHF8XWA4DXFZtCEwVC2wOE1kRWAELUW5dAEwnXy1aWhklbTYBZG5tCnsUMzFmGggVXVIHBgkzUgIUXTJJS1p7VQQEVFpYAHsVAm4KGWs" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAOYJK1olXDYDZBoCUBVIMzZNXhpXVhgcFR0DFxcIWDoXSQVJQ1pSCQNDWBlSWyhcBVhQIE5hCwAdYSp-VDt3clJzBWdxDi0IUQx3AHFQRA5BFBlbEQIABntofWYPZxhjD2NFJl41TEtfXQ5wRyFlUQoyUV9UAEISAm4MK1gXWgQEUFteD3t0ZAFSXyNgB0JpPG5dDXtcbW44G18QWA8DVFZaDnsXBG0AGF0dXwIHUlpaOEsfBF9UWQlUHzYyZF1tOHsVM2w4RTUUDgYCAAkICiVNSmxWRhpGGGgKVllaDEwUM20JGlkXbQ" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAOYJK1olXDYDZBoCUBVIMzZNXhpXVhgcFR0DFxcIWDoXSQVJQ1pSCQNDWBlSWyhcBVhQIE5hCwAdYSp-VDt3clJzBWdxDi0IUQx3AHFQRA5BFBlbEQIABntVXglKATlUWGZ3MgkOUSJ2aBFaZxBTUQoyUV9ZCU4nAG0PGV0RWAUFZD06ZhFTexpSXzB9bQQDUV9cAHtcbW44GFoXXQcDVVtUD3sXBG0AGF0dXwIHXV1cOEsfBF9UWQlUHzYyZF1tOHsVM2w4RTUUDgYCUVZUCyVNSmxWRhpAH2gKVllVAUMeM20JGlkXbQ" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAOYJK1olXDYDZBoCUBVIMzZNXhpXVhgcFR0DFxcIWDoXSQVJQ1pSCQNDWBlSWyhcBVhQIE5hCwAdYSp-VDt3clJzBWdxDi0IUQx3AHFQRA5BFBlbEQIABntQVApSTChtAWRhHA0KTgJKAgpebDNTUQoyUF1YCUkfAmcBK1gXWgQEUFteD3t0ZAFSXyNgB0JpPG5dDXtcbW44G1gSWQQHXF5dDHsXBG0AGF0dXwIHXVdZOEsfBF9UWQlUHzYyZF1tOHsVM2w4RTUUDgYCUVxdASVNSmxWRhpCB2gKVllaDEgXM20JGlkXbQ" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAOYJK1olXDYDZBoCUBVIMzZNXhpXVhgcFR0DFxcIWDoXSQVJQ1pSCQNDWBlSWyhcBVhQIE5hCwAdYSp-VDt3clJzBWdxDi0IUQx3AHFQRA5BFBlbEQIABnt0Qil2Hg9ADmNjLl9VATZQXyt7WT1lUQoyV1lUAUwnAG0PGV0RWAUFZD06ZhFTexpSXzB9bQQDUV9cAHtcbW44G1gSWQQDUVhbDHsXBG0AGF0dXwIGVVxYOEsfBF9UWQlUHzYyZF1tOHsVM2w4RTUUDgEHXV5eCiVNSmxWRhpOGGgKUlpZCkMWM20JGlkXbQ" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=/pages/union/proxy/proxy?spreadUrl=https%3a%2f%2funion-click.jd.com%2fjdc%3fe%3d%26p%3dJF8BAOYJK1olXDYDZBoCUBVIMzZNXhpXVhgcFR0DFxcIWDoXSQVJQ1pSCQNDWBlSWyhcBVhQIE5hCwAdYSp-VDt3clJzBWdxDi0IUQx3AHFQRA5BFBlbEQIABntUfzB7RgdTWGN3UxwDUy1Pajt-YCd1UQoyUF1YCUkfAmcBK1gXWgQEUFteD3t0ZAFSXyNgB0JpPG5dDXtcbW44G1gUXwACU15VAHsXBG0AGF0dXwIGVVZaOEsfBF9UWQlUHzYyZF1tOHsVM2w4RTUUDgYCXQ4KACVNSmxWRhpIBGgKVllVCEsRM20JGlkXbQ&EA_PTAG=17078.27.380">点此抢券</a>。</p><p data-vmark="f4e2">此券非全品类可用，但能用的产品还是很多的，例如今日大热的 AirPods Pro。</p><p data-vmark="2dbc"><a href="https://pro.m.jd.com/mall/active/2tLyRnoqXPXfeNX8WiPBkBdhvQ2/index.html?&cu=true&utm_source=kong&utm_medium=jingfen&utm_campaign=t_236375426_RV_kuIDkuZY&utm_term=fc25ac19a92b4f15afe108cf1039275f" target="_blank"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/12/049fc2b0-f155-436f-a330-386264362dbc.png" w="686" h="248" title="蹲点速度抢：京东 12 期免息券限量发放" width="686" height="248" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></a></p><p data-vmark="d850">如果没抢到上方免息券，另外还有一种方式可 12 期免息，有点麻烦但没有限制，需下载京东金融 App：<a href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAOkJK1olXDYDZBoCUBVIMzZNXhpXVhgcFR0DXR9QHDMXQA4KD1heSgUIUwgJUz1NQxxBQ1JJKTsdACJFcxh3GBwTJm1yEVlVTjRtZhUBG0VNAlNWHUEETRdKDV9LSyURKGB-FD4gWAx-c2Z4ZgxnWXFiWFJtDUofC2oPG1wWbQUAU1xbDE4UBF9rfDVPGX53Dho2YHsXBl9DdVolXQIHUVdcCEMQBV8IHFkdXg8CUl5YC0wXM28AHGtJH1RDFm5tOEgnM18JK1glA2gDB15dXE5FVAFSUlhVXA5LEDBVDE4fAW0AK1kUXAQAZA" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=/pages/union/proxy/proxy?spreadUrl=https%3a%2f%2funion-click.jd.com%2fjdc%3fe%3d%26p%&EA_PTAG=17078.27.380">点此领券</a>。</p><p data-vmark="0d65"><a href="https://prodev.m.jd.com/jdjr/active/ezLTq9XcAFN2v7JZAt69wNKTK81/index.html?&cu=true&utm_source=kong&utm_medium=jingfen&utm_campaign=t_236375426_RV_kuIDkuZY&utm_term=805a5c06541644f58f1c01716877a60f" target="_blank"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/12/cddaee3f-2a4c-41e0-9aa4-32fd931fa7c0.png" w="655" h="140" title="蹲点速度抢：京东 12 期免息券限量发放" width="655" height="140" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></a></p><p data-vmark="d2fd">会场内可领京东金融 12 期免息券，把想买的商品在“京东 App”加入购物车后，找到“京东金融 App”，点击底部中间“白条”→中部“分期商城”→右上角“购物车”，结算即可用 12 期免息券。</p><p data-vmark="3eca"><span class="accentTextColor">AirPods Pro（配 MagSafe 无线充电盒）</span>京东现售 1999 元，售价下方可领 500 元大额券，在领券中心（<a href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BANMJK1olXDYDZBoCUBVIMzZNXhpXVhgcBgAZSRVIHDMXQA4KD1heSgwJVw5DQHFeTx5nA0JDCgEvXBRSVywXSwlQBVhdZEQBXUNgayhufjNJPlJXVzpZASN-UTkEF2sQXA4KUVldD0gnAG0PGV0RWAUFZD06ZhFTexpSXzB9bQYHZBUzCXsXAGgMGV4dXA4KZF5aCkMXAGwBGVgVVQUyVFZaOBdVUS5KK2slXjYyZF9tC3tJbW5bHVkUDlEGOgQUCUlDRC9YdV8UVQ4LVlZtCkoWAW04" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BANQJK1olXDYDZBoCUBVIMzZNXhpXVhgcBgAZSRVIHDMXQA4KD1heSgwJVw5DQHFeTx5nA0JDCgEvXBRSVywXSwlQBVhdZAIZdzsWV2kSeBp3NkZEVQxefEsQQQ8EF2sWXAQGVV9eCUsQM2wKHFkTWQMBU24-byVNRxd9QR9-NTYCUW4WZkonA2sNHlIUXQ4FUm5dD0kfA2wLElkWXgEBZF5VD3tLQT1JWWslbQUyZG5cOEgnXQEJSFsWWQAKUjAHQUoVVyhKWzUQVAEAUlpcOEkWAm0KKw" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BANMJK1olXDYDZBoCUBVIMzZNXhpXVhgcBgAZSRVIHDMXQA4KD1heSgwJVw5DQHFeTx5nA0JDCgEvXBRSVywXSwlQBVhdZAY5DjhLZ2xMe1lvHVJbE18OTykVeDkEF2sQXA4KUVldD0gnAG0PGV0RWAUFZD06ZhFTexpSXzB9bQYHZBUzCXsUAm0IGloUWA8FZF5aCkMXAGwBGVgXXgEyVFZaOBdVUS5KK2slXjYyZF9tC3tJbW5bG1tAWwcHOgQUCUlDRCtWdV4cWgICUV1tCkoWAW04" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=/pages/union/proxy/proxy?spreadUrl=https%3a%2f%2funion-click.jd.com%2fjdc%3fe%3d%26p%3dJF8BANMJK1olXDYDZBoCUBVIMzZNXhpXVhgcBgAZSRVIHDMXQA4KD1heSgwJVw5DQHFeTx5nA0JDCgEvXBRSVywXSwlQBVhdZC0cEhQQdhpvewFJB0RQMTsFDS8fQDkEF2sQXA8KXVtcCU8nAG0PGV0RWAUFZD06ZhFTexpSXzB9bQYHZBUzCXsXAG4KHVsSXQ4KZF5aCkMXAGwBGVgRVA4yVFZaOBdVUS5KK2slXjYyZF9tC3tJbW5bG1gVDwBXOgQUCUlDRW9AdV4cWgUCVlhtCkoWAW04&EA_PTAG=17078.27.380">点此前往</a>）→“手机”栏目可领 1000-100 元优惠券，叠加 <a href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&-byVNRxd9QR9-NTYCVW4WZkonA2sNHlIUXQ4FUm5dD0kfA2wLHlsTWA4BZF5VD3tLQT1JWWslbQUyZG5cOEgnXQEJSFsWX1IAUTAHQUoVByRLTzUQVAQEXFtbOEkWAm0KKw" 元。</p><p data-vmark="19c7">如果在京东 12.12 主会场领到了 1500-120 元大额券，将更划算：<a
